name: Adelia rush
description:
Join your friends aboard a flying ship and go and conquer Adelia ! 

In this online cooperative game, with four players you can manage your own ship to overcome the dangers that cross the sky.

Prepare your crew and Adelia here we come !

                                       

Game made in 4 months by a team of 3 students of the CNAM-ENJMIN ( Engineers in apprenticeship) and 2 students of the EMCA (2D/3D artists) :

Engineers students of the CNAM-ENJMIN :

Programmer & Level-Designer • Billaud Pierre (Linkedin)

Programmer & Ergonomist • Bucher Morgan (Linkedin)

Programmer & Sound-Designer • Couturieux Victor (Linkedin)

Students of the EMCA :

Graphic Artist 2D/3D  • Kapris Anna

Graphic Artist 2D/3D  • Lecroart Théophile

                                      

Music  : Soundcloud
